snippet.title: Demon Spore - Exclusive Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Check out the teaser trailer for upcoming action roguelite game, Demon Spore. Inspired by 80s monster movies, Demon Spore is a twin stick shooter set deep inside a genetic research laboratory where a tissue replication experiment has gone horribly wrong. A mass of cells has evolved into a hellish creature and as a scientist trapped inside the lab with a few survivors, it's up to you to learn about this new organism and find its weaknesses.

Here’s a look at some tense Demon Spore gameplay, with a glimpse of how you’ll forge a path through the lab in your fight for survival. Demon Spore is coming soon to PC via Steam.

#IGN #Gaming
